title: Bug 6410: File dirtied by code assist when unchanged
description: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: The file is marked as dirtied even though it is not changed, and code assist does not appear.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, the file should not be marked as dirtied.
SR:
1. Open the file in the code editor.
2. Activate code assist.
3. Confirm that the file is marked as dirtied even though no changes were made.
